definition: strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc)/non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc)/vulgar/obscene

sentences.english: They never ate another animal's carcass.
sentences.chinese: 他們再也沒有喫過一點葷腥。

definition: see 吃閉門羹|吃闭门羹[chi1 bi4 men2 geng1]
food given to Buddhist monks as alms
extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to use public office to avenge private wrongs
to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
all taboos are off (idiom); anything goes/nothing is taboo
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
